mapper.sql: "sid" sid,"rule_name" ruleName,"active_begin_time" activeBeginTime,"active_end_time" activeEndTime, "create_user" createUser,"create_time" createTime,"update_user" updateUser,"update_time" updateTime,"flag" flag
mapper.select: select "sid" sid,"rule_name" ruleName,to_char( "active_begin_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') activeBeginTime,to_char( "active_end_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') activeEndTime, "create_user" createUser,to_char( "create_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') createTime,"update_user" updateUser,to_char( "update_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') updateTime,"flag" flag from "t_rule_new" trn where trn."flag" = 1 order by trn."sid" desc
mapper.update:
update "SPWG_0408"."t_rule_new" trn
trn."sid" = #{sid} ,
trn."rule_name" = #{ruleName} ,
trn."active_begin_time" = #{activeBeginTime} ,
trn."active_end_time" = #{activeEndTime} ,
trn."create_user" = #{createUser},
trn."create_time" = #{createTime},
trn."update_user" = #{updateUser},
trn."update_time" = #{updateTime},
trn."flag" = #{flag},
where trn."sid"= #{sid}
